body.name: Women's True Love Trouser Wide Leg Jean
features: STYLE - High rise trouser jean with wider leg fit, functional five pockets, zipper fly and belt loops on a slim hip and thigh fit
VERSATILITY - Goes well with all tops from today's fashion to a basic tee shirt and all footwear from sexy shoes to your favorite flats
LENGTH - This modernized trouser jean has a 33 inch regular inseam with a 25 inch leg opening
Jessica’s philosophy is that all body types need to be celebrated without sacrificing comfort or style.
body.description: Jessica Simpson Women's Apparel brand's True love high rise trouser jean with wider leg fit, functional five pockets, zipper fly and belt loops on a slim hip and thigh fit. A modernized trouser wide leg with enough stretch to keep you in stylish comfort from day to night. Works great with any top from fashion forward to a basic tee shirt and any footwear from sex shoes to your favorite flats or Boots, giving you the versatility you want. An essential piece, sure to elevate your wardrobe year round. Jessica Simpson established her denim brand in 2010 to be like her: approachable yet inspirational, sweet and sexy, and always off-the-moment with a touch of vintage influence. Jessica's philosophy is that all body types need to be celebrated without sacrificing comfort or style.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Gloria Vanderbilt, well-known for the Amanda Jean; America’s original slimming jean, has stood the test of time as one of the largest denim brands in North America. Today the brand encompasses a wide range of fits with quality fabrics, updated washes and fashionable details. Gloria Vanderbilt; long known for its best in class fit, has now expanded beyond their well-loved denim and colored bottoms to include: jackets, knits and woven tops to bring you effortless fun and style. Gloria Vanderbilt: America’s Original Designer Jean The brand started in 1976 between Gloria Vanderbilt and designer Mohan Murjani. Known for its fit, signature Gloria Vanderbilt embroidery and swan logo Our Brand's Most Famous Style To Date: Amanda Classic Tapered Jean - The original slimming jean. It seems to instantly flatten your tummy, creating flawless curves. Designed to sit perfectly at natural waist line, eliminating any unsightly muffin tops. Our jeans run from 4 to 18 in Missy, 4P to 16P in Petite and 14W to 24W in Plus size with some styles offered also in short and long length to suit all body types at any age.

Amanda Classic Curvy Skinny Amanda Boot Cut Amanda Button Down Shirt Shape Effect Pull On Straight Avery Pull On Style: The Original Fit Solution Jean that seems to flatten your tummy, creating flawless curves and eliminating any unsightly muffin tops Great Shaped Motion Flex Skinny; engineered with secret slimming panels in stretch denim with amazing recovery to look as fabulous as you’ll feel Sculpt stretch premium denim leg-lengthening boot cut style flatters every body type and may help you feel inches taller with or without the heels Button front shirt that can easily be dressed up or worn casually with Swan Monogram . Confidence in Full Effect; with a Pull on style with hidden elastic waist and comfortable stretch that covers allover. Contour Ultra Flex Pull On sculpting you to look your very best from every angle. Get the look of a jean with the comfortable ease of a pull on Description: Classic fit tapered leg, sits at natural waist, zipper fly and belt loops. Offered in Missy Sizes, Petite Sizes and Plus Sizes Contoured from hips to hemline, Mid Rise sits slightly below waistline, Functional five pocket styling, Zipper fly and belt loops. Offered in Missy Sizes and Petite Sizes Sits at natural waist, zipper fly and belt loops, slim through hips and thighs for a more modernized boot cut body, slimming silhouette and wide leg opening. Offered in Missy Sizes and Plus Sizes Classy feminine cut button up front shirt with tab roll sleeves, collar neck and side slits with high low curved hem. Comfort waist pull on jean sits at natural waist providing the coverage and flexability you want in a slim straight body Comfortable waistband sits slightly below natural waistline, Slim fit throughout from hips to ankles, Faux fly. Offered in Missy Sizes Front Rise: 11 1/4 " 9 3/4 " 11 1/4 " 11 1/4 " 10 1/2 " Average Length: 31 " 30 " 32 " 29 " frt / 30.5 " bk 30 " 30 " Multiple Lengths: ✓ ✓ ✓ Petite / Plus Sizes: ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓
Gloria Vanderbilt - A versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These jeans are my new favorites! For my body type, they ate. They are exactly as pictured and described. I'm curvy and have a little tummy so they fit exactly where I need them. Not too tight or uncomfortable. They are perfect denim material in a nice quality fabric. High-quality stitching. Perfect length for flats or a small heel. I have purchased some many jeans in my lifetime, I am telling you- these are the ones you should be buying. I'm impressed and love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These fit true to size in the waist/hips/thighs (true trouser cut, not flare/boot cut) and are great quality - they’ve held up nice for months with consistent wear. They are veryyy long though. I’m 5’4” and couldn’t wear them but my mom is 5’9” and they are perfect with flats/sneakers and heels!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I Wanted To Love Them
reviews.reviewText: I bought these in hope, that they would fit me well. They didn’t 😩 They were way too long for me and kind of big. For the price of them and then would have to pay to get them hemmed, didn’t seem worth it to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits true to size
reviews.reviewText: I’m very impressed with the quality. It’s true to size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The legs are super wide really wide

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, but overpriced - they run big
reviews.reviewText: The fit is great when you first put them on. However, they start stretching as the day goes by. I'm a 12/14 so I bought a 32 just in case, but I wish I had sized down. I will keep my jeans because they’re comfortable and breathable for warm weather, but I think they’re overpriced for the low quality of the fabric. For reference, I’m 5’3” and they’re at least 3 inches too long for my legs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic trouser/wide leg jeans
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love the fit of these jeans. They are so comfortable and flattering. Classy looking. Love the wide leg. Ditto color isn’t quite as dark as it appears in the photos. Great color though. I am 5’2”, 118 pounds, apple shape. They seem to have a little stretch to accommodate when I bloat. I had to have them hemmed. Heavy to mid weight. High quality. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Runs too large and pants are to long

reviews.reviewText: J'adore mais je dois retourner car trops grand. Je vais prendre 2 tailles plus petit!

I love these jeans however they do run big. I ordered a 25 and they are gaping around the waist. Based on the style I don’t mind that they are baggy however if you want something more fitted through the waist, I suggest sizing down. Super cute pants. I also agree with the other review that the inseam is more like 30”.

The Amazon description says these have a 33-in inseam. I would say they are more like a 30. Way too short. I looked like Jethro from the Beverly Hillbillies and my husband laughed at me. I'm about 5'9 weigh about 165/ 170. I checked the size chart and measured for fit. Although they're a little on the big side, I would have kept them had they been the correct length. I usually wear a 34 inseam, which is sometimes a bit long on me, so 33 would have been good. So disappointed. I really wanted these to fit. Returning
